meanings: (눈물·땀·피 등을) (눈물을) cry, shed, (땀을) sweat, (formal) perspire, (피를) bleed, (침을) drool, slobber
put blood, sweat, and tears into a job
money earned by the sweat of one´s brows
achieve economic progress by toiling night and day

meanings.meaning: rinse the food down with a glass of milk

vlive.korean: 내가 언제 방송에서 콧물을 흘려? When did I do that on the show? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIM JUNSU X Eating Show - 김준수 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: When did I do that on the show?

vlive.korean: 맞아요, 시간을 그냥 흘려보내는 느낌? Yeah, it feels like I'm wasting my time. 듣기 View video OSEN : THE BOYZ 더보이즈, 본격 리얼 눕방 #스타로드 10
vlive.english: Yeah, it feels like I'm wasting my time.

vlive.korean: 저 진짜 이거 먹으면 땀 엄청 흘려요 - 한번 먹으라고 해주면 안 돼요? If I eat it, I will sweat like crazy. - Can you tell him to try it? 듣기 View video X1 : 시간 내에 제목이 떠오르지 않았습니다😂
vlive.english: If I eat it, I will sweat like crazy. - Can you tell him to try it?

vlive.korean: [언니들 다정함에 나 눈물만 흘려...] 코 푼 휴지 어때? [I'm shedding tears for these kind girls] What about tissue I blew my nose with? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 울와가! 세글자! 게임을! 하는데! 눈이 와..!❄️ (TWICE playing 3 letters game)
vlive.english: [I'm shedding tears for these kind girls] What about tissue I blew my nose with?

vlive.korean: 어!!! 눈물 흘려요 눈물 흘려요!!! Oh! He's crying! He's crying!! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [PENTAGON] 우리 펜타곤 이렇게 완벽한데 솔직히 게임 하나 정도는 못해도 상관없잖아요 (PENTAGON playing games)

examples.korean: Don’t let the situation escape from your grasp. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상황을 그냥 흘려보내지 말고 단단히 통제하도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake. (Victor Hugo) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인생에 큰 슬픔이 닥칠 때에는 용기를, 작은 슬픔에는 인내심을 가져라. 그리고 땀 흘려 일과를 마친 후 편안히 잠자리에 들라. 신께선 깨어 계신다. (빅터 위고, 인내명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake. (Victor Hugo) Add to Wordbook
